text.div:
LocationRelevance

Indicates whether the responsible PHA is relevant because of the patient's home address, the provider facility address, or both

This code system http://fhir.hl7.org/us/case/CodeSystem/lr-codes defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
home HomeSubject's home address
provider ProviderProvider's facility address
both BothBoth subject's home address and provider's facility address

name: LocationRelevance
description: Indicates whether the responsible PHA is relevant because of the patient's home address, the provider facility address, or both

concept.definition: Both subject's home address and provider's facility address
